dada2 taxa

dada2_taxa.Rd

dada2 taxa

Usage

dada2_taxa(
  asvtable = NULL,
  train = NULL,
  species = NULL,
  chatty = TRUE,
  multi = FALSE,
  example = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

asvtable

A file containging your sequences; most commonly the ASV table output from dada2.

train

Path to database that you'd like to use for taxonomic assignment.

species

OPTIONAL: path to database if you'd like to use assignSpecies() function

chatty

Set to FALSE for less text to print to screen

multi

Set to TRUE to use mutithreading where possible

example

Run example data. Default is FALSE

...

Allows passing of arguments to nested functions

Value

A table of taxonomic assigments

Examples

asvtable <- dada2_asvtable(example = TRUE)
#> Error in if (where == "inst/extdata/f") {    example <- TRUE    where <- NULL}: argument is of length zero
train <- "inst/extdata/db/EXAMPLE_silva_nr99_v138.2_toGenus_trainset.fa.gz"
species <- "inst/extdata/db/EXAMPLE_silva_v138.2_assignSpecies.fa.gz"
dada2_taxa(asvtable = asvtable, train = train, species = species)
#> Error: object 'asvtable' not found
